name: Helping Hand
description: We will help you in every possible way. All you have to do is tell us your problem. We are ready to help you always.

name: Beautiful Campus
description: We have beautiful campus so that you can learn comfortably. We will practically show you how can you grow grapes in your own land.

name: How to use fertizer and soil
description: We will show you how to properly make your soil and if there are any bad insect we will teach you how to deal with it.

name: Rich Library
description: We have Absolutely one of the best library. Here you can read all the famous book about grapes.

name: Government Certified
description: We are certified by the Government. So you dont't have to worry about any fraud.

name: Cheap
description: our course fee is minimal. So that everyone can afford it.

name: Win a prize
description: If you successfully grow grapes in your land with 1 year, you will be given a chance to win a national prize.

name: Extra Care
description: If  you face any uncertain problem, we will help you as much as possible. All you need to do is to reach to us.
